# Government Tender Announcement

### RFP - Facilities Maintenance and Support Services, DRDC Toronto

**Tender Information**

* **Reference Number**: MX-443129259394
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: DC25FM01-80578
* **Publication Date**: 2024-05-17
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-06-26T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-06-26

### Description

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is inviting proposals from qualified firms to provide facilities maintenance and support services for Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) in Toronto.

The contract will involve providing maintenance and support services for all identified buildings and their associated infrastructure within defined property limits. The services must be delivered to a standard that will not cause the buildings to deteriorate beyond normal wear and tear throughout the contract term.

The initial period of service will be five (5) years, with the potential for two additional two-year periods if mutually agreed upon.

### Requirements

* The successful contractor must hold a valid Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the level of SECRET, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).
* The contractor must provide information to support their proposal, which will be evaluated against established criteria in the RFP.
* Firms interested in submitting a proposal must register with Merx and upload their bid electronically by the closing date.

### Notice

This solicitation is being conducted in accordance with the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

For questions and inquiries, please contact:
Mark Smith
Mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
613-859-0549

### RFP Documents

The RFP documents, including the terms and conditions, can be accessed on Merx. Bidders can also access the website of Defence Construction Canada at https://www.cdc-dcc.gc.ca/industry/contract-activity for information on contract award results and bidding documents.

### Bidding

Bidding and documents are available on Merx. Fees may apply, and please refer to the Merx website for more information.

For more details, please refer to the RFP documents and Merx website. We look forward to receiving your proposal. 400 words.
